Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.name: name
Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.abstract: The name of the service, i.e. google, github, etc.

Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.name: tokenPrefix
Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.abstract: The prefix for the access token when it is used in a authorization header. Defaults to ‘Bearer ’.

Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.name: endpoints
Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.abstract: The endpoints for the provider’s API to use for initializing FederatedCreatable types

Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.abstract: Syntax sugar for getting or setting one of the service’s endpoints.

Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.name: get(service:)
Structs/OAuthService.html#/s:8Imperial12.abstract: Gets a service if it is available for use.

Structs/OAuthService.html.name: OAuthService
Structs/OAuthService.html.abstract: Represents a service that interacts with an OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.name: tokens
Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.abstract: The service’s token model for getting the client ID and secret.

Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.name: router
Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.abstract: The service’s router for handling the request for the access token.

Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.name: init(router:authenticate:callback:scope:completion:)
Protocols/FederatedService.html#/s:8Impe.abstract: Creates a service for getting an access token from an OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: tokens
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: A class that gets the client ID and secret from environment variables.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: callbackCompletion
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The callback that is fired after the access token is fetched from the OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: scope
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The scopes to get permission for when getting the access token.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: callbackURL
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The URL (or URI) for that route that the provider will fire when the user authenticates with the OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: accessTokenURL
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The URL on the app that will redirect to the authURL to get the access token from the OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: authURL
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The URL of the page that the user will be redirected to to get the access token.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: init(callback:completion:)
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: Creates an instence of the type implementing the protocol.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: configureRoutes(withAuthURL:on:)
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: Configures the authenticate and callback routes with the droplet.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: fetchToken(from:)
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: Gets an access token from an OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: authenticate(_:)
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The route to call when the user is going to authenticate with the OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.name: callback(_:)
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html#/s.abstract: The route that the OAuth provider calls when the user has benn authenticated.

Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html#/s:8Im.name: serviceKey
Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html#/s:8Im.abstract: The key for the service’s endpoint to use when request.create is called with the implimenting type.

Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html#/s:8Im.name: create(from:)
Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html#/s:8Im.abstract: Creates an instance of the model with JSON.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.name: idEnvKey
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.abstract: The name of the environment variable that has the client ID.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.name: clientID
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.abstract: The client ID for the OAuth provider that the service is connected to.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.name: secretEnvKey
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.abstract: The name of the environment variable that has the client secret.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.name: clientSecret
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.abstract: The client secret for the OAuth provider that the service is connected to.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.name: init()
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html#/s.abstract: Gets the client ID and secret from the environment variables and store them.

Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html.name: FederatedServiceTokens
Protocols/FederatedServiceTokens.html.abstract: Represents a type that fetches the client id and secret

Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html.name: FederatedCreatable
Protocols/FederatedCreatable.html.abstract: Defines a type that can be created with federated login data.

Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html.name: FederatedServiceRouter
Protocols/FederatedServiceRouter.html.abstract: Defines a type that implements the routing to get an access token from an OAuth provider.

Protocols/FederatedService.html.name: FederatedService
Protocols/FederatedService.html.abstract: Represents a connection to an OAuth provider to get an access token for authenticating a user.

Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.name: accessToken()
Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.abstract: Gets the access token from the session.

Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.name: get(_:as:)
Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.abstract: Gets an object stored in a session with JSON as a given type.

Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.name: set(_:to:)
Extensions/Session.html#/s:5Vapor7Sessio.abstract: Sets a key in the session to a codable object.

Extensions/Request.html#/s:5Vapor7Reques.name: accessToken()
Extensions/Request.html#/s:5Vapor7Reques.abstract: Gets the access token from the current session.

Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8ImperialE.name: value(or:)
Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8ImperialE.abstract: Gets the value contained in an optional.

Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.name: noServiceFound
Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.abstract: Thrown when no service is registered with a given name.

Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.name: noExistingService
Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.abstract: Thrown when no FederatedSewrvice type is found whgen creating a Service from JSON.

Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.name: noServiceEndpoint
Enums/ServiceError.html#/s:8Imperial12Se.abstract: Thrown when a FederatedCreatable type has a serviceKey that does not match any available endpoints in the service.

Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.name: missingEnvVar
Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.abstract: Thrown when no environment varibale is found with a given name.

Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.name: missingJSONFromResponse
Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.abstract: Thrown when we attempt to create a FederatedCreatable model and there is

Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.name: typeNotInitialized
Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.abstract: Thrown when request.fetch is called with a type that has not been run through request.create.

Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.name: description
Enums/ImperialError.html#/s:8Imperial0A5.abstract: A human readable version of the error thrown.

Enums/ImperialError.html.name: ImperialError
Enums/ImperialError.html.abstract: Represents various errors that can occur when attempting to unwrap an optional value.

Enums/ServiceError.html.name: ServiceError
Enums/ServiceError.html.abstract: Represents an error that occurs during a service action.

Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html#/s:8Impe.name: init(redirect:)
Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html#/s:8Impe.abstract: Creates an instance of ImperialMiddleware with the option of a redirect path.

Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html#/s:8Impe.name: respond(to:chainingTo:)
Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html#/s:8Impe.abstract: Checks that the request contains an access token. If it does, let the request through. If not, redirect the user to the redirectPath.

Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html.name: ImperialMiddleware
Classes/ImperialMiddleware.html.abstract: Protects routes from users without an access token.
